/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings that line the street. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a bright sun in the top left corner. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Traffic lights and street signs are visible along the road, indicating a well-regulated traffic system. The overall scene is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of man-made structures and nature in Beijing.
